website_summaries.verdict: The Sharp HT-SB602 offers plenty of features, a wide soundstage and high-energy movie playback, but its overall sound quality can't stand up to similarly priced rivals.
pros: The ultra-wide Sharp HT-SB602 squeezes a ton of features into an incredibly svelte package, with Bluetooth, Dolby, DTS, HDMI inputs and a wireless subwoofer
It's capable of creating a wide soundstage and movie dialog is very crisp
cons: The Sharp's sound quality is surpassed by competitors at the same price
There's an audible bass gap between the speaker and sub, and the sound can be annoyingly bright when listening to music
The unit's subwoofer looks cheap compared with the main unit

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product! Great sound.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the product after one month of use. Makes the TV speakers sound like a tin can! This replaced a less powerful sound bar that just wasn't strong enough to get the volume I wanted. Not so with the Sharp. Plenty loud for the 60" TV I have and the 15x15 room it's in. I also like that the bar comes on automatically when it detects signal from the TV, and goes to sleep when it doesn't. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: James E. Rosato

customer_reviews.title: Easy on the ears!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased when it was a Consumer Reports top rated sound bar. First one we have ever owned, and have been very happy with it for almost a year now. Fills our great room with quality sound, and way better than the TV speakers. Easy connections for use with TV and DVD player, great for watching/listening with movies, sports, etc. Would recommend and buy again.
customer_reviews.author: angienav

customer_reviews.title: Never Again
customer_reviews.text: I bet this would be great if the people I got it from included the remote. as it is I can't adjust the sub volume. Lesson learned. NEVER BUY USED or REFURBISHED ONLINE AGAIN. sold by
customer_reviews.author: Eviltek2099

customer_reviews.title: Great sound bar, after initial repair by Sharp.
customer_reviews.text: I probably would have given this five stars as the sound quality is quite good, but the first unit arrived DOA and, rather than simply replace it, Sharp wanted to repair it, so it had to be shipped back (thanks Sharp for the FEDEX pickup). No thanks to the One Call people who had no replacement and offered only to refund the purchase price. I will not use "One Call" again.
customer_reviews.author: Steven D. Edgett

customer_reviews.title: Great soundbar.
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly with my 60" Aquos. I have it mounted underneath and it is exactly the same width. The sound is clear and rich for such a small set of speakers. The subwoofer definitely helps the low end sounds. NFC tags are really a nice feature if the soundbar is positioned in a hard to reach place. Pairing with Bluetooth just takes a quick second and you can place the tags anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Eric H Shafer

customer_reviews.title: Nice but didn't last
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in August of 2015. Started having issues with video reception in August. Changed everything out before Soundbar but the issue ended up being the Soundbar. It's been a year so no options to return or replace. Overall it was a decent Soundbar for the price and the size (to fit under a large TV) just didn't last!
customer_reviews.author: Kandyfreak

customer_reviews.title: This Sound Bar is awesome. We have 60" Sharp Aquos TV (2014 model) ...
customer_reviews.text: This Sound Bar is awesome. We have 60" Sharp Aquos TV (2014 model) and this really complements and give the TV added depth with sound. It really suits our needs. We are not Home Theater/Audio buffs, and this exceeds our needs. We have it dialed to a middle of the road setting I would say, and the sound is clear, loud, and great. If you need more, this may not work for you though.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond E.

customer_reviews.title: Sharp diagnosed the problem as a bad remote. The new remote didn't help
customer_reviews.text: The unit did not work. Sharp diagnosed the problem as a bad remote. The new remote didn't help. I had to box up all components and send in to their repair facility. I asked for a brand new unit to be shipped. After a major delay and total run-around, they finally shipped a new unit. The new one has worked fine and the sound is very good. The rating would be higher if it wasn't for the first unit being bad and a very bad experience getting the replacement shipped. I would be very suspect of any other Sharp products and would try to buy from a different manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Superb soundbar for the price!
customer_reviews.text: For the money this sound bar is superb! I have heard other sound bars from various mfg's which cost a lot more and this will easily compete and best their sound bars. a sound bar will not replace surround sound but this bar will certainly fill the room. I currently have it set up with a 55" tv and size wise is perfect. definitely looks better with a larger tv and will work great for a larger room.
customer_reviews.author: Badgers1013

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. It replaced my ages old, bulky system and still gives great sound. Enough sound that pictures will vibrate off the wall if I'm not careful with the loudness.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Derrick

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Sound
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, easy to set up, excellent sound and the base is really good. I have seen these units selling for $ 400.00 , the unit I paid $ a 100.00 for was packaged as a new unit and could only think it was new.
customer_reviews.author: Thousands of Books Read

customer_reviews.title: was not disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this model on Consumer Reports recommendation, was not disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Nasty Crotch

customer_reviews.title: Our large flat screen was about three years old and ...
customer_reviews.text: Our large flat screen was about three years old and already outdated to make this work right. We use it, but have to make a choice. We can use it to view our Directv channels, but it doesn't work with DVDs. Hopefully by the time we upgrade the TV the sound bar will not be too old :-(
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted 2 months.
customer_reviews.text: Only lasted 2 months and then stopped working. Had no trouble returning it for my money back, although I had already thrown away box and had to purchased boxes for it to fit in. I went locally and bought something that was easier to return if necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte Madia

customer_reviews.title: Remote bad
customer_reviews.text: Have for three years now and replaced remote 3 times Sound quality good but remote just dies:(

customer_reviews.title: Sounds good, looks good
customer_reviews.text: Sounds good, looks good, and not so many wires a my big suround sound system I had. Not a loud either but I don't watch much tv anymore. I have had this sound bar a month or two and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart A. Joynt

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Attractive, good sound...poor instructions. Winstructions should illuminate what is ARC and how/why use it...and how to troubleshoot common problems with setting up ARC. If you remove the frustration of installation, the product is very good. The packaging is smart. It works as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Jony Tumbles

customer_reviews.title: Not worth buying doesn't last six months
customer_reviews.text: bought in November 2016 and unit now cycles between Bluetooth and HDMI1 on its own despite unplugging and resetting. Makes unit unusable.
customer_reviews.author: johnm

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, especially at higher volumes
customer_reviews.text: Good sound, especially at higher volumes. Added bass is very good, though often too high and requires a lower volume. Does not work with my Samsung remote - looking for a universal remote replacement.
customer_reviews.author: AlanP

customer_reviews.title: Small footprint big sound
customer_reviews.text: Replace an older Bose system and receiver and am very pleased with the performance of this Sharp soundbar. Hookup was easy and the Bluetooth connection to the sub woofer is slick.

customer_reviews.title: Which is pretty
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my TV because it has bluetooth which allows me to stream music from the computer / cell phone / anything. Which is pretty awesome

customer_reviews.title: I understand it would have sounded great but it arrived with the circuit protection active
customer_reviews.text: I understand it would have sounded great but it arrived with the circuit protection active, a blinking light, and would not clear, DOA.

customer_reviews.title: Sharp sound bar
customer_reviews.text: I bought a factory restored one and it's just like new for half the price. Sounds great!

customer_reviews.title: sound quality perfect & was easy to set it up and pair ...
customer_reviews.text: Met my expectation, sound quality perfect & was easy to set it up and pair it with all my devices, IPhone, tablet and laptop via Bluetooth, I definitely recommend this. Good for house party, friends hangout et Chilling moment

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this product now that they replaced my defective ...
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this product now that they replaced my defective one they were very nice about replacing it

customer_reviews.title: It has been working great! Costumer service was fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Would have given it five stars, but wouldn't power up when I took it out of the box. I called Sharp, and they took it back. They told me they needed to replace a part. It came back two weeks later. It has been working great! Costumer service was fantastic!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This thing is the Bomb! A snap to install, with theatre quality sound (or better)!

customer_reviews.text: We love it, the sound quality is awesome, it is easy to operate, and there are many options for it!

customer_reviews.text: Works really great with my current Sharp TV, one remote :)

customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing sound bar. We had done a fair amount of research....seems many are overpriced for the quality of the sound output. We're thrilled and would recommend it highly!

customer_reviews.title: worked perfectly fine as advertised
customer_reviews.text: worked perfectly fine as advertised, came with everything to work with my 60 inch sharp led. Very dynamic, i like how i can just pair my iphone and pump music, turn on the tv and it just steals the audio.

customer_reviews.title: Nightmare
customer_reviews.text: HDMI ARC worked 2 times and after turning off each time, the unit wouldn't connect with HDMI. I have a Samsung TV and tried to work with Sharp and Samsung but seems like it becomes finger pointing. I returned one after the soundbar stopped working. I received the second sound bar and still had issues with the HDMI ARC. It would work with an optical connection but now the soundbar again isn't turning on so I'll have to return this one too. I won't buy a Sharp soundbar again.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Centeno

customer_reviews.title: decent soundbar, but it did start to act up ...
customer_reviews.text: decent soundbar, but it did start to act up after a year, and the remote totally stopped working in 16 months.
customer_reviews.author: pholenstein

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: sound is better than a fairly comparable Yamaha but certainly a long way from clear.
customer_reviews.author: derbydon

customer_reviews.title: One year lifespan
customer_reviews.text: Soundbar looks and sounds great... for about a year. The sound sometimes doesn't come on at all, sometimes it will just cut out spontaneously. The soundbar doesn't disconnect or lose power or indicate in any way that sound is no longer broadcasting, but no sound comes out. If I unplug the cable and reconnect it, sound will usually come back on, but nothing I've been able to do short of physically unplugging the cable has had any success. When the sound cuts out on the soundbar, it does not automatically switch to the tv audio as it would if the soundbar were turned off, so there's just silence. Lasted about a year.
customer_reviews.author: Juggles

customer_reviews.title: Won't last 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality was excellent. Base was loud but wouldn't boom over content, 3-D sound effects gave the sense of surround sound, and overall the quality was amazing for both movies and music. However, this is all in the past tense as a few weeks ago I noticed the subwoofer stopped working, and therefore the 3-D effects, and overall sound quality immediately went to the dumps. I bought this in mid April and it was early December when I noticed the malfunction. Also it auto connects to bluetooth from other devices too often, but that's probably the issue of the devices and not the speaker, and the IR remote is annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Nick W.

customer_reviews.title: Incompatible w/other remotes
customer_reviews.text: After 10 months of ownership, I'm convinced this purchase was a bad decision. We have two rubber bands connecting our universal remote back-to-back to the Sharp sound bar remote. That doesn't sound like much of an inconvenience, but it is. Setting the universal remote down face-up will often inadvertently push a Sharp button or vice-a-versa. Oh, the sound quality is good. Yes, there's a several second lag between power-on and sound-on. I kept hoping "Sharp will publish codes," or "Sharp will work with the cable/dish/universal remote people." Hope is not a strategy. Consumer Reports not withstanding, buy a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Cust

customer_reviews.title: Sharp HT sound bar

customer_reviews.title: It has a great sound that brings your TV to life
customer_reviews.text: It has a great sound that brings your TV to life. It comes with an HDMI cable and is easy to install.

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the room and tv I have. Room is a two story, approximately 300sq ft and tv size is70". I have had it for a month or so and I think it's wonderful!

customer_reviews.title: I really don't see much audio improvement with the sound ...

The sound level going from low to high when watching movies drives me crazy - constantly having to change the volume level. I was hoping with a different setting, i.e. movies, news, games, etc. this could be eliminated but no luck.

customer_reviews.title: Too Expensive for What It Delivers

Very little to recommend this sound bar even though it came as a recommendation from a leading consumer magazine. Much too expensive for what it delivers. You can finsd better at lower prices than this one.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend to anyone

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the sound bar but wish it had more volume/power.

customer_reviews.title: As recommended by Consumer Reports magazine
customer_reviews.text: As recommended by Consumer Reports magazine, I'm very pleased with how this particular sound bar distributes the sound across the space of a larger room. Mine is wall-mounted and looks fantastic. The subwoofer produces a clean, rich bass. The ARC port helps reduce an extra cable run.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice sound for the cost and totally enhances the sound on my 60" Vizio

customer_reviews.title: We didn't realize what we had been missing.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't think our tv needed this but after reading reviews on our 70" vizio, I thought I would give this soundbar a try. It works great! When I turn it off is when I realize the glorious sounds we've been missing. Nice bass through the subwoofer.

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to install
customer_reviews.text: It was not at all easy to hook up. It needed an optical cable-not included. According to the instructions, the set up was 1, 2, 3. But not the case. HDMI and/or output and input jacks did not work for this on a 2 y/o LG smart TV. Had to pay a professional to install. Also the sound is not what I had expected. Box-sound quality. Disappointing all around.
customer_reviews.author: Xavier

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is decent, hard to complain for the price.

customer_reviews.title: A must buy for large screens
customer_reviews.text: I previously had a speakercraft cs3, one of the best sound bars of 2013. But this new sound bar blows it out of the water! More balanced sound for all around listening. Plus it looks great with my 60" Panasonic gt50

customer_reviews.text: Great sound from such a compact system. I am very happy with it.

customer_reviews.title: Disgruntled with failing hardware and Amazon support : Do not purchase!

Each player (we tried 3 different brands) seems to work when directly connected to the TV but not when connected to the TV through the sound bar. I could not recommend this sound bar. Also of note is how difficult it is to get support from Amazon on something they sell. I still have not found a solution.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

The sound is different than my Bose system, but we needed to get one of these because of how our TV is set up. I wish there was a cover to cover the grill of the speaker. The only one I looked at that sounded way better was the Bose sound bar, but it was 800 dollars more.

I sure wish they would have made it fit under the TV on the TV stand and not interfere with the remote. The bar is slightly taller than the distance between the TV and the stand, so it blocks the IR receiver for the remote.

customer_reviews.title: This Sharp HT-SB602 sound bar is great! The sound is crystal clear and I love ...
customer_reviews.text: This Sharp HT-SB602 sound bar is great! The sound is crystal clear and I love the different mode options for either movies or video games! I have had this item for almost 6 months now and there have been no issues. I highly recommend this item.

customer_reviews.text: It sounds good but more inputs needed for the many appliances you want to run through it.

customer_reviews.text: This performs fine. Not being an audiofile, we were just looking for better sound quality for our TV. I am disappointed that there is no output connections, to drive some exterior speakers, but I could have seen that before I purchased them, so mea culpa.
customer_reviews.author: Dave S

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great. It is much better than the LG speakers
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great. It is much better than the LG speakers. I use the optical port from my LG TV because I use an antennae and all other ports are in use. The socket for the optical cable on the sound bar does not fit the optical cable plug. I taped it in place to stabilize it. The sound bar uses a remote control. The remote is unnecessarily complex. It has more buttons than my TV or DVD player. I think Sony should rethink the ergonomics of the remote. On the other hand, the sound bar is relatively smart and seems to anticipate what I want. I only use the volume buttons.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Bristol

customer_reviews.title: I'm so glad he did
customer_reviews.text: I've never even heard of a sound bar until my friend told me. I'm so glad he did. The sound is really great, and adds a lot of great sound to the tv. I would recommend to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Hurd

customer_reviews.title: Would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.text: Started out good. Sound quality was acceptable although below my expectation. Then the blutooth subwoofer quite connecting. Without subwoofer sound is not good. I will have to submitt to warranty for repair. That's never good.

customer_reviews.title: Sound bar works fine I guess

customer_reviews.text: I can't hear the TV very clearly or distinctly. Everything has to go thru the sound bar. Why can"t the images go directly to the TV and the sound to the sound bar? I'am currently using 4 remote controls.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Hickman

product_meta.title: Sharp HT-SB602 2.1 Channel 310W Bluetooth Sound Bar
product_meta.description: A big audio experience for a big-screen TV. The HT-SB602 is uniquely designed to complement 60" Class and larger flat panel televisions. Sleek, stylish and powerful, this 2.1-channel 310-watt sound bar system with wireless subwoofer and Bluetooth capabilities features a unique exposed driver design for home theater sound and a lustrous black finish design. This system can be set up either horizontally in front of a TV base or wall-mounted. Built to deliver an unbelievable sound experience, the HT-SB602 also features dual HDMI inputs, NFC functionality for "touch" pairing with Bluetooth devices, an IR Blaster, 3D support, Dolby and DTS decoding and an Optical input.
feature_bullets: 54-Inch 310W (2.1 channels) - ideal for 60-Inch and larger TVs
Wall Mountable: Yes: Remote Included: Yes

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars169 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
